title: Shop price problem
body: the original price of  pool party graves is 1350 but in my store is says 2230, it also happened to the rest of the skin in my shop

replies.body: You may not own the champion for that skin if the price seems unusually high. If the skin has a circle of the champ at the bottom of the card, it means the champion themselves is included in the price which is why it seems too high.
